All Classes

  • Class Description
    Arrow
    An arrow is the projectile shoot by the bowman
    ArrowConstants
    Interface that contains constants relative to an arrow
    AttackListener
    Listener triggered when a living being attack status changes
    AttackVisual  
    AttackVisualsManager
    Data manager for the atack visuals (cooldown)
    BackgroundRenderer
    Game grass background renderer with keys on first start
    BossConstants
    Interface that contains constants relative to a boss
    BossHealthBar  
    Bowman
    Bowman is a ranged monster that shoot arrow and run away if the player is too close
    BowmanBoss
    a BomanBoss is a bigger and deadlier bowman that can summon allies
    BowmanConstants
    Interface that contains constants relative to a bowman
    Button
    Button graphic interface
    ButtonListener
    Extension of the Slick MouseListener interface with all empty defaults defined
    EffectRenderer
    Visual effect renderer : attack slashes and bow charge and release
    EndScreen  
    EnemiesManager
    Enemies data manager
    Entity
    The mother class of all our elements in game
    FadeToBlack  
    FadeToBlackListener
    listener triggered on FadeToBlack update
    Fireball
    A fireball is a spell that the player can use
    FireballConstants
    Interface that contains constants relative to a fireball
    FontRenderer
    Simple TrueTypeFont renderer
    GameStats  
    HUDManager
    Game HUD Manager : player health bar, boss shealth bar, hurt effect and difficulty
    HurtEffectRenderer
    Visual effect to indicate to the user that the player was hurt
    IBoss  
    Item
    An item is an object that increase the statistics of the player
    ItemManager
    Item manager for the item
    ItemRenderer
    Render for items in item rooms (yellow portals)
    KeyPressListener
    Extension of the KeyListener interface with all empty defaults defined
    Knight
    A knight is a melee monster with a sword
    KnightBoss  
    KnightConstants  
    LivingBeing
    LivingBeing are entity that have heathPoint
    LivingBeingConstants
    Interface that contains constants relative to a living being
    LivingBeingHealthListener
    Listener triggered when the being health is updated.
    LivingBeingMoveListener
    Listener triggered when the being moves
    LivingBeingRenderer
    Most complex renderer of this package
    Dynamic activity and directional renderer
    MainClass  
    Melee  
    MeleeAttack
    MeleeAttack is a one frame projectile that representes a melee attack from the player
    Monster
    A monster is an living bein that isn't control by the player
    PauseMenu
    Pause menu graphic interface
    Player
    the player is a being that the user can control
    PlayerConstants
    Interface that contains constants relative to the player
    PlayerHealthBar  
    PlayerMarkerRenderer
    The player spell direction indicator (white circle and arrow)
    Portal
    A portal is an object that the player can interact with to go in another room
    PortalRenderer
    Portal renderer with 2 animations, the opening animation and the opened animation
    PortalsManager
    Portal data manager
    PortalsManagerListener
    Listener triggered when a portal is engaged
    Projectile
    A projectile is an Entity wihout life summoned by a LivingBeing
    ProjectileRenderer
    projectile renderer for fireballs and arrows
    Ranged
    Ranged monster are monster that can shoot projectiles
    Rusher
    old class that isn't relevant anymore
    SpriteRenderer
    Basic abstract renderer
    SpriteView
    Sprite view for LivingBeingRenderer class
    SummonListener
    Listener triggered when a boss is summoning a minion
    TimeScale  
    UIHealthBar  
    WorldHealthBar
